channel.title: notes on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in notes on My Blog

item.title: Model Interpretability
item.description:
Understanding and being able to justify what your machine learning model has learned is very important.

In this post, I cover :

  • understanding model by their weights
  • understanding how individiual feature interact through partial dependency plots
  • justifying individual predictions using Shap and Lime

item.title: Conference Notes - Google Cloud Next 2019
item.description:
Google Cloud had their annul conference in April this year in San Francisco. There were a lot of cool announcements.

Here is my list of announcements that I am excited for.
